price: Dis : "Il m’a été interdit d’adorer ceux que vous invoquez en dehors d’Allah." Dis : "Je ne suivrai pas vos passions : car ce serait m’égarer, et je ne serais plus parmi les bien-guidés."
arabic: قُلۡ إِنِّي نُهِيتُ أَنۡ أَعۡبُدَ ٱلَّذِينَ تَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِۚ قُل لَّآ أَتَّبِعُ أَهۡوَآءَكُمۡ قَدۡ ضَلَلۡتُ إِذٗا وَمَآ أَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلۡمُهۡتَدِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul innī nuhītu an aʿbuda alladhīna tadʿūna min dūni al-lahi qul lā attabiʿu ahwāakum qad ḍalaltu idhan wamā anā mina al-muh'tadīna
